content:
All three of these vineyards have good red wines as well. 

Castello di Amorosa produces a wide range of red wines, including Cabernet Sauvignon, Merlot, Syrah, Sangiovese, and Zinfandel. With over 30 reds listed on their website, you are sure to find a favorite.

At Robert Sinskey Vineyards, red wines shine. They are known for their Pinot Noirs and Cabernet Sauvignons, as well as their blends like POV (Point of View). These wines are made from sustainable, organic grapes.

Sterling Vineyards produces some lovely red blends and single varietals such as Cabernet Sauvignon, Merlot, Malbec, and Pinot Noir. They also offer some unique wines like their Platinum Cabernet Sauvignon.

So, if you're a red wine person, you can still enjoy these vineyards and their extensive red wine selections.
